mosinstall.name: mod_zoom_menue
mosinstall.author: Per Lasse Baasch
mosinstall.description: mod_zoom_menue allows to navigate from every site to a part of the com_zoom. Requires com_zoom2.5.1RC2 or higher !!! PLEASE NOTE THAT SOME TEMPLATES CAN OVERTAKE THE CONTROL OF SOME USED STYLES, please notify me if it's so !!!

param.name: info
param.default: PLEASE NOTE THAT SOME TEMPLATES CAN OVERTAKE THE CONTROL OF SOME USED STYLES, please notify me if it's so. !!!
param.label: ATTENTION->READ !!!

param.name: zoomMenueTOPspacer
param.label: Top Spacer
param.description: Spacer on TOP for varius Templates

param.name: zoomMenueRootRand
param.label: Random Menue
param.description: Random Menue yes/no !using also before configured root!

param.name: zoomMenueDCut
param.label: Discription CUTTING
param.description: Max Stringlen until YOUR design crashes!

param.name: zoomMenueSubDCut
param.label: Discription CUTTING
param.description: Max Stringlen until YOUR design crashes!

param.name: zoomMenueStyleFontColorA
param.label: Color normal
param.description: Fontcolor normal. Set it to # when you don't want to adjust it.

param.name: zoomMenueStyleFontColorB
param.label: Color hover
param.description: Fontcolor hover. Set it to # when you don't want to adjust it.

param.name: zoomMenueStyleBgColorA
param.label: Bgcolor normal
param.description: Backgroundcolor normal. Set it to # when you don't want to adjust it.

param.name: zoomMenueStyleBgColorB
param.label: Bgcolor hover
param.description: Backgroundcolor hover. Set it to # when you don't want to adjust it.
